snippet: Mr. Trump’s past includes divorces, sex scandals and a onetime stance for abortion rights, yet some Christian conservatives find his reputation as a ruthless fighter appealing.
abstract: Presidential hopeful Donald J Trump, already seen by some political conservatives as a poor fit as Republican standard-bearer, likely faces equally deep distrust from the party's social and religious conservatives, particularly conservative Christians; Trump's rivals on campaign circuit are beginning to bring his history of liberal ideas, seemingly decadent New York lifestyle and lack of overt religious faith to the attention of conservative Christian voters.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s past includes divorces, sex scandals and a onetime stance for abortion rights, yet some Christian conservatives find his reputation as a ruthless fighter appealing.

headline.main: Donald Trump Finds Defenders and Detractors Among Conservatives
headline.print_headline: Trump Finds Defenders and Detractors Among Christian Conservatives
